item.title: Max Nguyen
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Software engineer focused on Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations and the Microsoft business stack (Power Platform, Azure) with 10+ years delivering business-critical systems across APAC and the U.S. Built, deployed, and supported AX 2009/2012 (AX5/AX6) and D365FO, with strengths in Financial Services and Supply Chain. Based in Los Angeles, CA.
